Macht Globals für die Seite verfügbar.

URL code (slug) used to find the primary: Slug, um einen Datensatz zu suchen.

This record is not visible because it ha: This record is not visible because it has been deleted.

Number of records to display on a single: Number of records to display on a single page. Leave empty to disable pagination.
Invalid format of the records per page v: Invalid format of the records per page value. The value should be a number.
